chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
nisi: nextIndex_safety_interface

Goal:
forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), Prefix (findGtIndex l i) l

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Prefix = fix Prefix (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A) {struct l1} : Prop := match l1 with | [] => True | a :: l1' => match l2 with | [] => False | b :: l2' => a = b /\ Prefix A l1' l2' end end : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop Arguments Prefix {A}%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
logIndex = nat : Set
findGtIndex_Prefix : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), Prefix (findGtIndex l i) l
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_commute : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : logIndex), sorted l -> removeAfterIndex (findGtIndex l i) i' = findGtIndex (removeAfterIndex l i') i
subseq_findGtIndex : forall (xs : list entry) (i : logIndex), subseq (findGtIndex xs i) xs
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i_lt_i' : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i < i' -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i'
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i'_le_i : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i' <= i -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i
removeAfterIndex_in : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (a : entry), In a (removeAfterIndex l i) -> In a l
removeAfterIndex_eq : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), (forall e : entry, In e l -> eIndex e <= i) -> removeAfterIndex l i = l
findGtIndex_nil : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), (forall e' : entry, In e' l -> eIndex e' <= i) -> findGtIndex l i = []
contiguous_sorted_last : forall (l : list entry) (x : entry) (i : nat), sorted (l ++ [x]) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (l ++ [x]) i -> eIndex x = S i /\ contiguous_range_exact_lo l (S i)
prefix_contiguous : forall (l l' : list entry) (e : entry) (i : nat), l' <> [] -> Prefix l' l -> sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e > i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' i -> In e l'
thing2 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), l <> [] -> Prefix l l' -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> l ++ removeAfterIndex l' i = l'
contiguous_app_prefix_2 : forall (l l' l'' : list entry) (i : nat), sorted (l ++ l') -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (l ++ l') 0 -> Prefix l' l'' -> maxIndex l'' < i <= maxIndex l -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e l
findGtIndex_max : forall (entries : list entry) (x : logIndex), maxIndex (findGtIndex entries x) <= maxIndex entries
findGtIndex_non_empty : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), i < maxIndex l -> findGtIndex l i <> []
Prefix_refl : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), Prefix l l
Prefix.Prefix_refl : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), Prefix l l
raft_refined_base_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => refined_base_params : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> RaftParams orig_base_params -> BaseParams Arguments raft_refined_base_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
findGtIndex_app_1 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), maxIndex l' <= i -> findGtIndex (l ++ l') i = findGtIndex l i
Prefix_cons : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), Prefix l' l -> Prefix (a :: l') (a :: l)
findGtIndex_app_2 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), sorted (l ++ l') -> i < maxIndex l' -> findGtIndex (l ++ l') i = l ++ findGtIndex l' i
cons_contiguous_sorted : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat) (a : entry), sorted (a :: l) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (a :: l) i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i
Prefix_sane = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (l l' : list entry) (i : logIndex) => l <> [] \/ i = maxIndex l' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> logIndex -> Prop Arguments Prefix_sane {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
prefix_sorted : forall l l' : list entry, sorted l -> Prefix l' l -> sorted l'
multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
findGtIndex_contiguous : forall (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e entries /\ eIndex e = i) -> forall i : nat, x < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e (findGtIndex entries x) /\ eIndex e = i
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ [x])) -> forall l : list A, P l
contiguous_sorted_subset_prefix : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (i : nat), contiguous_range_exact_lo l1 i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l2 i -> sorted l1 -> sorted l2 -> (forall e : entry, In e l1 -> In e l2) -> Prefix (rev l1) (rev l2)
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}

```coq
intros l i.
apply findGtIndex_Prefix.
Qed.
```
